title: I got an S rating on mastery 6 Kog'maw, but didn't receive any mastery 7 tokens
body:
Hi there, I was wondering if the mastery 7 tokens for a champion only applies to Summoners Rift? Since on my latest game of Kog'maw where I went 23/7/26 with 77 cs in 15:26 of time, I got an S rating. But I didn't receive any mastery 7 tokens for Kog'maw, which spawned the question I had above.

Thanks for your time!

replies.body: Heya, it looks like this was completed in ARAM.  Tokens currently only drop in Summoner's Rift.  Congrats on your progress, though!
It really sucks that you only get tokens on summoner rift tho :/ I mean if you're good in any game than shouldn't we receive a token? Eh, just my opinion.
